00033    * Constructor.

00035    Exchanger::Exchanger()
00036     : sendArray_(),
00037       recvArray_(),
00038       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00039       emptyBonds_(),
00040       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00041       emptyAngles_(),
00042       #endif
00043       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00044       emptyDihedrals_(),
00045       #endif
00046       #endif
00047       bound_(),
00048       inner_(),
00049       outer_(),
00050       multiProcessorDirection_(),
00051       boundaryPtr_(0),
00052       domainPtr_(0),
00053       atomStoragePtr_(0),
00054       bondStoragePtr_(0),

00072    /*
00073    * Set pointers to associated objects.
00074    */
00075    void Exchanger::associate(const Domain& domain, 
00076                              const Boundary& boundary, 
00077                              AtomStorage& atomStorage, 
00078                              GroupStorage<2>& bondStorage, 
00079                              #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00080                              GroupStorage<3>& angleStorage, 
00081                              #endif
00082                              #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00083                              GroupStorage<4>& dihedralStorage, 
00084                              #endif
00085                              Buffer& buffer)
00086    {
00087       domainPtr_ = &domain;
00088       boundaryPtr_ = &boundary;
00089       atomStoragePtr_ = &atomStorage;
00090       bondStoragePtr_ = &bondStorage;
00091       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00092       angleStoragePtr_ = &angleStorage;
00093       #endif
00094       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00095       dihedralStoragePtr_ = &dihedralStorage;
00096       #endif
00097       bufferPtr_ = &buffer;
00098    }

00100    /*
00101    * Allocate memory.
00102    */
00103    void Exchanger::allocate()
00104    {
00105       // Preconditions
00106       if (!bufferPtr_->isInitialized()) {
00107          UTIL_THROW("Buffer must be allocated before Exchanger");
00108       }
00109 
00110       int sendRecvCapacity = bufferPtr_->ghostCapacity()/2;
00111 
00112       // Reserve space for all ghost send and recv arrays
00113       int i, j;
00114       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00115          for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00116             sendArray_(i, j).reserve(sendRecvCapacity);
00117             recvArray_(i, j).reserve(sendRecvCapacity);
00118          }
00119       }
00120 
00121       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00122       emptyBonds_.reserve(sendRecvCapacity);
00123       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00124       emptyAngles_.reserve(sendRecvCapacity);
00125       #endif
00126       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00127       emptyDihedrals_.reserve(sendRecvCapacity);
00128       #endif
00129       #endif
00130    }

00133    * Set slab width used for ghosts.
00134    */
00135    void Exchanger::setPairCutoff(double pairCutoff)
00136    {  pairCutoff_ = pairCutoff; }

00142    void Exchanger::exchange()
00143    {
00144       exchangeAtoms();
00145       exchangeGhosts();
00146    }
00147 
00148    template <int N>
00149    void Exchanger::initGroupGhostPlan (GroupStorage<N>& storage)
00150    {
00151       double coordinate;
00152       GroupIterator<N> groupIter;
00153       Atom* atomPtr;
00154       int nIn;
00155       int nOut;
00156       int i, j, k;
00157       bool choose;
00158 
00159       storage.begin(groupIter);
00160       for ( ; groupIter.notEnd(); ++groupIter) {
00161 
00162          // Compute ghost communication plan for group
00163          groupIter->plan().clearFlags();
00164          for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00165             if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
00166                for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00167                   choose = false;
00168                   nIn = 0;
00169                   nOut = 0;
00170                   for (k = 0; k < N; ++k) {
00171                      atomPtr = groupIter->atomPtr(k);
00172                      if (atomPtr) {
00173                         coordinate = atomPtr->position()[i];
00174                         if (atomPtr->isGhost()) {
00175                            if (j == 0) {
00176                               if (coordinate < inner_(i, j)) {
00177                                  ++nOut;
00178                               }
00179                               if (coordinate > outer_(i, j)) {
00180                                  ++nIn;
00181                               }
00182                            } else {
00183                               if (coordinate > inner_(i, j)) {
00184                                  ++nOut;
00185                               }
00186                               if (coordinate < outer_(i, j)) {
00187                                  ++nIn;
00188                               }
00189                            }
00190                         } else { 
00191                            if (atomPtr->plan().exchange(i, j)) {
00192                               ++nOut;
00193                            } else {
00194                               ++nIn;
00195                            }
00196                         }
00197                      } else {
00198                         choose = true;
00199                         break;
00200                      }
00201                   } // end for k
00202                   if (nOut > 0 && nIn > 0) {
00203                      choose = true;
00204                   }
00205                   if (choose) {
00206                      groupIter->plan().setGhost(i, j);
00207                   } else {
00208                      groupIter->plan().clearGhost(i, j);
00209                   }
00210                } // end for j
00211             }
00212          } // end for i
00213 
00214          // Clear pointers to all ghost atoms in group
00215          for (k = 0; k < N; ++k) {
00216             atomPtr = groupIter->atomPtr(k);
00217             if (atomPtr) {
00218                if (atomPtr->isGhost()) {
00219                   groupIter->clearAtomPtr(k);
00220                }
00221             }
00222          }
00223 
00224       }
00225    }
00226 
00227    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00228    /*
00229    * Pack bonds that contain postmarked atoms.
00230    */
00231    template <int N>
00232    void Exchanger::packGroups(int i, int j, 
00233                               GroupStorage<N>& storage, 
00234                               APArray< Group<N> >& emptyGroups)
00235    {
00236       GroupIterator<N> groupIter;
00237       Atom* atomPtr;
00238       int k, nAtom;
00239       bool choose;
00240 
00241       bufferPtr_->beginSendBlock(Buffer::GROUP, N);
00242       emptyGroups.clear();
00243       storage.begin(groupIter);
00244       for ( ; groupIter.notEnd(); ++groupIter) {
00245          choose = false;
00246          nAtom = 0;
00247          for (k = 0; k < N; ++k) {
00248             atomPtr = groupIter->atomPtr(k);
00249             if (atomPtr) {
00250                if (atomPtr->plan().exchange(i, j)) {
00251                   choose = true;
00252                   groupIter->clearAtomPtr(k);
00253                } else {
00254                   ++nAtom;
00255                }
00256             }
00257          }
00258          if (nAtom == 0) {
00259             emptyGroups.append(*groupIter);
00260          }
00261          if (choose) {
00262             bufferPtr_->packGroup<N>(*groupIter);
00263          }
00264       }
00265       bufferPtr_->endSendBlock();
00266    }
00267 
00268    /*
00269    * Remove empty bonds from GroupStorage<N>.
00270    */
00271    template <int N>
00272    void Exchanger::removeEmptyGroups(GroupStorage<N>& storage,
00273                                      APArray< Group<N> >& emptyGroups)
00274    {
00275       int nEmpty = emptyGroups.size();
00276       #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
00277       #ifdef EXCHANGER_DEBUG
00278       // Confirm that groups are actually empty
00279       Atom* atomPtr;
00280       int   atomId;
00281       for (int k = 0; k < nEmpty; ++k) {
00282          for (int m = 0; m < N; ++m) {
00283             atomId = emptyGroups[k].atomId(m);
00284             atomPtr = emptyGroups[k].atomPtr(m);
00285             assert(atomPtr == 0);
00286             assert(atomStoragePtr_->find(atomId) == 0);
00287          }
00288       }
00289       #endif
00290       #endif
00291       for (int k = 0; k < nEmpty; ++k) {
00292          storage.remove(&(emptyGroups[k]));
00293       }
00294    }
00295 
00296    // Unpack bonds into bondStorage.
00297    template <int N>
00298    void Exchanger::unpackGroups(GroupStorage<N>& storage)
00299    {
00300       Group<N>* newGroupPtr;
00301       Group<N>* oldGroupPtr;
00302       int bondId;
00303 
00304       bufferPtr_->beginRecvBlock();
00305       while (bufferPtr_->recvSize() > 0) {
00306          newGroupPtr = storage.newPtr();
00307          bufferPtr_->unpackGroup<N>(*newGroupPtr);
00308          bondId = newGroupPtr->id();
00309          oldGroupPtr = storage.find(bondId);
00310          if (oldGroupPtr) {
00311             storage.returnPtr();
00312             atomStoragePtr_->findGroupAtoms(*oldGroupPtr);
00313          } else {
00314             storage.add();
00315             atomStoragePtr_->findGroupAtoms(*newGroupPtr);
00316          }
00317       }
00318       assert(bufferPtr_->recvSize() == 0);
00319    }
00320    #endif
00321 
00322    template <int N>
00323    void Exchanger::finishGroupGhostPlan(GroupStorage<N>& storage)
00324    {
00325       GroupIterator<N> groupIter;
00326       Atom* atomPtr;
00327       Plan* planPtr;
00328       int i, j, k, nAtom;
00329 
00330       // Set ghost communication flags for atoms in incomplete bonds
00331       storage.begin(groupIter);
00332       for ( ; groupIter.notEnd(); ++groupIter) {
00333 
00334          #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
00335          #ifdef EXCHANGER_DEBUG
00336          int atomId;
00337          nAtom  = 0;
00338          for (k = 0; k < N; ++k) {
00339             atomPtr = groupIter->atomPtr(k);
00340             atomId  = groupIter->atomId(k);
00341             if (atomPtr != 0) {
00342                if (atomPtr != atomStoragePtr_->find(atomId)) {
00343                   UTIL_THROW("Error in atom pointer in bond");
00344                }
00345                if (atomPtr->isGhost()) {
00346                   UTIL_THROW("Pointer to ghost atom in bond");
00347                } else {
00348                   ++nAtom;
00349                }
00350             } else { // if atomPtr == 0
00351                atomPtr = atomStoragePtr_->find(atomId);
00352                if (atomPtr) {
00353                   if (!atomPtr->isGhost()) {
00354                      UTIL_THROW("Missing pointer to local atom in bond");
00355                   }
00356                }
00357             }
00358          }
00359          assert(nAtom == groupIter->nPtr());
00360          if (nAtom == 0) {
00361             UTIL_THROW("Empty bond");
00362          }
00363          #endif
00364          #endif
00365 
00366          // Set communication flags for atoms in incomplete groups
00367          nAtom = groupIter->nPtr();
00368          if (nAtom < N) {
00369             for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00370                if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
00371                   for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00372                      if (groupIter->plan().ghost(i, j)) {
00373                         for (k = 0; k < N; ++k) {
00374                            atomPtr = groupIter->atomPtr(k);
00375                            if (atomPtr) {
00376                               assert(!atomPtr->isGhost());
00377                               #ifdef EXCHANGER_GHOST
00378                               planPtr = &atomPtr->plan();
00379                               if (!planPtr->ghost(i, j)) { 
00380                                  planPtr->setGhost(i, j);
00381                                  sendArray_(i,j).append(*atomPtr);
00382                               }
00383                               #else
00384                               atomPtr->plan().setGhost(i, j);
00385                               #endif
00386                            }
00387                         }
00388                      }
00389                   }
00390                }
00391             }
00392          }
00393 
00394       }
00395    }
00396 
00403    void Exchanger::exchangeAtoms()
00404    {
00405       stamp(START);
00406       Vector lengths = boundaryPtr_->lengths();
00407       double bound, inner;
00408       double coordinate;
00409       AtomIterator atomIter;
00410       Atom* atomPtr;
00411       Plan* planPtr;
00412       int i, j, jc, ip, jp, k, source, dest, nSend;
00413       int shift;
00414       bool isHome;
00415       bool isGhost;
00416 
00417       // Set domain and slab boundaries
00418       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00419          for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00420             // j = 0 sends to lower coordinate i, bound is minimum
00421             // j = 1 sends to higher coordinate i, bound is maximum
00422             bound = domainPtr_->domainBound(i, j);
00423             bound_(i, j) = bound;
00424             if (j == 0) { // Communicate with lower index
00425                inner_(i,j) = bound + pairCutoff_;
00426                outer_(i, j)= bound - pairCutoff_;
00427             } else { // j == 1, communicate with upper index
00428                inner_(i, j) = bound - pairCutoff_;
00429                outer_(i, j) = bound + pairCutoff_;
00430             }
00431             sendArray_(i, j).clear();
00432          }
00433          if (domainPtr_->grid().dimension(i) > 1) {
00434             multiProcessorDirection_[i] = 1;
00435          } else {
00436             multiProcessorDirection_[i] = 0;
00437          }
00438       }
00439 
00448       // Compute communication plan for every local atom
00449       atomStoragePtr_->begin(atomIter);
00450       for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00451 
00452          planPtr = &atomIter->plan();
00453          planPtr->clearFlags();
00454          isHome  = true;
00455          isGhost = false;
00456 
00457          // Cartesian directions
00458          for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00459   
00460             coordinate = atomIter->position()[i];
00461  
00462             // Transmission direction
00463             for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00464    
00465                // j = 0 sends to lower coordinate i
00466                // j = 1 sends to higher coordinate i
00467 
00468                // Index for conjugate (reverse) direction
00469                if (j == 0) jc = 1;
00470                if (j == 1) jc = 0;
00471    
00472                if (j == 0) { // Communicate with lower index
00473                   if (coordinate < bound_(i, j)) {
00474                      planPtr->setExchange(i, j);
00475                      #ifdef EXCHANGER_GHOST
00476                      if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
00477                         isHome = false;
00478                      }
00479                      #endif
00480                      if (coordinate > outer_(i, j)) {
00481                         planPtr->setGhost(i, jc);
00482                         isGhost = true;
00483                      }
00484                   } else {
00485                      if (coordinate < inner_(i, j)) {
00486                         planPtr->setGhost(i, j);
00487                         isGhost = true;
00488                      }
00489                   }
00490                } else { // j == 1, communicate with upper index
00491                   if (coordinate > bound_(i, j)) {
00492                      planPtr->setExchange(i, j);
00493                      #ifdef EXCHANGER_GHOST
00494                      if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
00495                         isHome = false;
00496                      }
00497                      #endif
00498                      if (coordinate < outer_(i, j)) {
00499                         planPtr->setGhost(i, jc);
00500                         isGhost = true;
00501                      }
00502                   } else {
00503                      if (coordinate > inner_(i, j)) {
00504                         planPtr->setGhost(i, j);
00505                         isGhost = true;
00506                      }
00507                   }
00508                }
00509    
00510             } // end for j
00511          } // end for i
00512 
00513          #ifdef EXCHANGER_GHOST
00514          // Add atoms that will be retained by this processor,
00515          // but will be communicated as ghosts to sendArray_
00516          if (isGhost && isHome) {
00517             for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00518                for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00519                   if (planPtr->ghost(i, j)) {
00520                      sendArray_(i, j).append(*atomIter);
00521                   }
00522                }
00523             }
00524          }
00525          #endif
00526 
00527       } // end atom loop, end compute plan
00528       stamp(ATOM_PLAN);
00529 
00530       /*
00531       * Find groups that span boundaries (uses information about ghosts).
00532       * Clear pointers to ghosts in each Group after inspecting the Group.
00533       *
00534       * Atoms in Group<N> objects that span boundaries, and are incomplete
00535       * after atom migration, are marked for sending as ghosts in the
00536       * finishGroupGhostPlan<N> function, further below.
00537       */
00538       initGroupGhostPlan<2>(*bondStoragePtr_);      // bonds
00539       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00540       initGroupGhostPlan<3>(*angleStoragePtr_);     // angles
00541       #endif
00542       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00543       initGroupGhostPlan<4>(*dihedralStoragePtr_);  // dihedrals
00544       #endif
00545       stamp(INIT_GROUP_PLAN);
00546 
00547       // Clear all ghost atoms from AtomStorage
00548       atomStoragePtr_->clearGhosts();
00549       stamp(CLEAR_GHOSTS);
00550 
00551       #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
00552       #ifdef EXCHANGER_DEBUG
00553       int nAtomTotal;
00554       atomStoragePtr_->computeNAtomTotal(domainPtr_->communicator());
00555       int myRank = domainPtr_->gridRank();
00556       if (myRank == 0) {
00557          nAtomTotal = atomStoragePtr_->nAtomTotal();
00558       }
00559       bondStoragePtr_->isValid(*atomStoragePtr_, 
00560                                domainPtr_->communicator(), false);
00561       #endif
00562       #endif
00563 
00564       // Cartesian directions for exchange (0=x, 1=y, 2=z)
00565       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00566 
00567          // Transmission direction
00568          // j = 0 sends to processor with lower grid coordinate i
00569          // j = 1 sends to processor with higher grid coordinate i
00570          for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00571 
00572             // Index for conjugate (reverse) direction
00573             if (j == 0) jc = 1;
00574             if (j == 1) jc = 0;
00575 
00576             source = domainPtr_->sourceRank(i, j); // rank to receive from
00577             dest = domainPtr_->destRank(i, j);     // rank to send to
00578             bound = domainPtr_->domainBound(i, j); // bound for send
00579             inner = inner_(i, jc);             // inner bound upon receipt 
00580             shift = domainPtr_->shift(i, j);   // shift for periodic b.c.
00581 
00582             #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00583             if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
00584                bufferPtr_->clearSendBuffer();
00585                bufferPtr_->beginSendBlock(Buffer::ATOM);
00586             }
00587             #endif
00588 
00589             // Choose atoms for sending, pack and mark for removal.
00590             sentAtoms_.clear();
00591             atomStoragePtr_->begin(atomIter);
00592             for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00593 
00594                #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
00595                #ifdef EXCHANGER_DEBUG
00596                if (j == 0) {
00597                   choose = (atomIter->position()[i] < bound);
00598                } else {
00599                   choose = (atomIter->position()[i] > bound);
00600                }
00601                assert(choose == atomIter->plan().exchange(i, j));
00602                #endif
00603                #endif
00604 
00605                if (atomIter->plan().exchange(i, j)) {
00606 
00607                   #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00608                   if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
00609 
00610                      sentAtoms_.append(*atomIter);
00611                      bufferPtr_->packAtom(*atomIter);
00612 
00613                   } else 
00614                   #endif
00615                   {
00616 
00617                      // Shift position if required by periodic b.c.
00618                      if (shift) {
00619                         atomIter->position()[i] += shift * lengths[i];
00620                      }
00621                      assert(atomIter->position()[i] 
00622                             > domainPtr_->domainBound(i, 0));
00623                      assert(atomIter->position()[i] 
00624                             < domainPtr_->domainBound(i, 1));
00625 
00626                      // For gridDimension==1, only nonbonded ghosts exist.
00627                      // The following assertion applies to these.
00628                      assert(!atomIter->plan().ghost(i, j));
00629 
00630                      #if UTIL_DEBUG
00631                      // Check ghost communication plan
00632                      if (j == 0 && atomIter->position()[i] > inner) { 
00633                         assert(atomIter->plan().ghost(i, 1));
00634                      } else 
00635                      if (j == 1 && atomIter->position()[i] < inner) {
00636                         assert(atomIter->plan().ghost(i, 0));
00637                      }
00638                      #endif
00639 
00640                   }
00641                }
00642 
00643             } // end atom loop
00644             stamp(PACK_ATOMS);
00645 
00646             #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00647             // Send and receive only if processor grid dimension(i) > 1
00648             if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
00649 
00650                // End atom send block
00651                bufferPtr_->endSendBlock();
00652 
00653                // Pack bonds that contain postmarked atoms.
00654                packGroups<2>(i, j, *bondStoragePtr_, emptyBonds_);
00655                #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00656                packGroups<3>(i, j, *angleStoragePtr_, emptyAngles_);
00657                #endif
00658                #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00659                packGroups<4>(i, j, *dihedralStoragePtr_, emptyDihedrals_);
00660                #endif
00661                stamp(PACK_GROUPS);
00662 
00663                /*
00664                * Note: Removal cannot be done within the above loops over 
00665                * atoms and groups because element removal invalidates a
00666                * PArray iterator.
00667                */
00668 
00669                // Remove chosen atoms (listed in recvArray) from atomStorage
00670                nSend = sentAtoms_.size();
00671                for (k = 0; k < nSend; ++k) {
00672                   atomStoragePtr_->removeAtom(&sentAtoms_[k]);
00673                }
00674                stamp(REMOVE_ATOMS);
00675      
00676                // Remove empty bonds from bondStorage.
00677                removeEmptyGroups<2>(*bondStoragePtr_, emptyBonds_);
00678                #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00679                removeEmptyGroups<3>(*angleStoragePtr_, emptyAngles_);
00680                #endif
00681                #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00682                removeEmptyGroups<4>(*dihedralStoragePtr_, emptyDihedrals_);
00683                #endif
00684                stamp(REMOVE_GROUPS);
00685 
00686                // Send to processor dest and receive from processor source
00687                bufferPtr_->sendRecv(domainPtr_->communicator(), 
00688                                     source, dest);
00689                stamp(SEND_RECV_ATOMS);
00690 
00691                // Unpack atoms into atomStorage
00692                bufferPtr_->beginRecvBlock();
00693                while (bufferPtr_->recvSize() > 0) {
00694 
00695                   atomPtr = atomStoragePtr_->newAtomPtr();
00696                   bufferPtr_->unpackAtom(*atomPtr);
00697                   atomStoragePtr_->addNewAtom();
00698 
00699                   if (shift) {
00700                      atomPtr->position()[i] += shift * lengths[i];
00701                   }
00702                   assert(atomPtr->position()[i] 
00703                          > domainPtr_->domainBound(i, 0));
00704                   assert(atomPtr->position()[i] 
00705                          < domainPtr_->domainBound(i, 1));
00706 
00707 
00708                   #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
00709                   // Check ghost plan
00710                   assert(!atomPtr->plan().ghost(i, j));
00711                   if (j == 0) {
00712                      assert( atomPtr->plan().ghost(i, 1)
00713                              == (atomPtr->position()[i] > inner) );
00714                   } else {
00715                      assert( atomPtr->plan().ghost(i, 0)
00716                              == (atomPtr->position()[i] < inner) );
00717                   }
00718                   #endif
00719 
00720                   #ifdef EXCHANGER_GHOST
00721                   planPtr = &atomPtr->plan();
00722 
00723                   // Determine if new atom will stay on this processor.
00724                   isHome = true;
00725                   if (i < Dimension - 1) {
00726                      for (ip = i + 1; ip < Dimension; ++ip) {
00727                         if (multiProcessorDirection_[ip]) {
00728                            for (jp = 0; jp < 2; ++jp) {
00729                               if (planPtr->exchange(ip, jp)) {
00730                                  isHome = false;
00731                               }
00732                            }
00733                         }
00734                     }
00735                   }
00736 
00737                   // If atom will stay, add to ghost sendArrays
00738                   if (isHome) {
00739                      for (ip = 0; ip < Dimension; ++ip) {
00740                         for (jp = 0; jp < 2; ++jp) {
00741                            if (planPtr->ghost(ip, jp)) {
00742                               sendArray_(ip, jp).append(*atomPtr);
00743                            }
00744                         }
00745                      }
00746                   }
00747                   #endif
00748 
00749                }
00750                assert(bufferPtr_->recvSize() == 0);
00751                stamp(UNPACK_ATOMS);
00752 
00753                // Unpack bonds into bondStorage.
00754                unpackGroups<2>(*bondStoragePtr_);
00755                #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00756                unpackGroups<3>(*angleStoragePtr_);
00757                #endif
00758                #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00759                unpackGroups<4>(*dihedralStoragePtr_);
00760                #endif
00761                stamp(UNPACK_GROUPS);
00762 
00763             } // end if gridDimension > 1
00764             #endif
00765 
00766          } // end for j (direction 0, 1)
00767       } // end for i (Cartesian index)
00768 
00769       /*
00770       * At this point:
00771       * No ghost atoms exist.
00772       * All atoms are on correct processor.
00773       * No Groups are empty.
00774       * All pointer to local atoms in Groups are set.
00775       * All pointers to ghost atoms in Groups are null.
00776       */
00777 
00778       #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
00779       #ifdef EXCHANGER_DEBUG
00780       // Validity checks
00781       atomStoragePtr_->computeNAtomTotal(domainPtr_->communicator());
00782       if (myRank == 0) {
00783          assert(nAtomTotal = atomStoragePtr_->nAtomTotal());
00784       }
00785       atomStoragePtr_->isValid();
00786       bondStoragePtr_->isValid(*atomStoragePtr_, 
00787                                domainPtr_->communicator(), false);
00788       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00789       angleStoragePtr_->isValid(*atomStoragePtr_, 
00790                                 domainPtr_->communicator(), false);
00791       #endif
00792       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00793       dihedralStoragePtr_->isValid(*atomStoragePtr_, 
00794                                    domainPtr_->communicator(), false);
00795       #endif
00796       #endif
00797       #endif
00798 
00799       // Set ghost communication flags for atoms in incomplete groups
00800       finishGroupGhostPlan<2>(*bondStoragePtr_);
00801       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00802       finishGroupGhostPlan<3>(*angleStoragePtr_);
00803       #endif
00804       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00805       finishGroupGhostPlan<4>(*dihedralStoragePtr_);
00806       #endif
00807 
00808       stamp(FINISH_GROUP_PLAN);
00809    }
00810 
00811    /*
00812    * Find all ghost members of groups at the end of exchangeGhosts.
00813    */
00814    template <int N>
00815    void Exchanger::findGroupGhosts(GroupStorage<N>& storage)
00816    {
00817       GroupIterator<N> groupIter;
00818       int nAtom;
00819       storage.begin(groupIter);
00820       for ( ; groupIter.notEnd(); ++groupIter) {
00821          nAtom = groupIter->nPtr();
00822          if (nAtom < N) {
00823             nAtom = atomStoragePtr_->findGroupAtoms(*groupIter);
00824             if (nAtom < N) {
00825                UTIL_THROW("Incomplete group after search for ghosts");
00826             }
00827          }
00828       }
00829    }
00830 
00831    /*
00832    * Exchange ghost atoms.
00833    *
00834    * Call immediately after exchangeAtoms and before rebuilding the 
00835    * neighbor list on time steps that require reneighboring. Uses
00836    * ghost communication plans computed in exchangeAtoms.
00837    */
00838    void Exchanger::exchangeGhosts()
00839    {
00840       stamp(START);
00841 
00842       // Preconditions
00843       assert(bufferPtr_->isInitialized());
00844       assert(domainPtr_->isInitialized());
00845       assert(domainPtr_->hasBoundary());
00846       if (atomStoragePtr_->nGhost() != 0) {
00847          UTIL_THROW("atomStoragePtr_->nGhost() != 0");
00848       }
00849 
00850       Vector  lengths = boundaryPtr_->lengths();
00851       double  bound, inner;
00852       Atom* atomPtr;
00853       Atom* sendPtr;
00854       int i, j, jc, ip, jp, k, source, dest, shift, size;
00855 
00856       // Clear all send and receive arrays
00857       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00858          for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00859             recvArray_(i, j).clear();
00860          }
00861       }
00862 
00863       #ifndef EXCHANGER_GHOST
00864       AtomIterator  localIter;
00865       atomStoragePtr_->begin(localIter);
00866       for ( ; localIter.notEnd(); ++localIter) {
00867          for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00868             for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00869                if (localIter->plan().ghost(i, j)) {
00870                    sendArray_(i, j).append(*localIter);
00871                }
00872             }
00873          }
00874       }
00875       #else
00876       #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
00877       #ifdef EXCHANGER_DEBUG
00878       // Add local atoms to all appropriate send arrays
00879       {
00880          FMatrix<int, Dimension, 2> sendCounter;
00881          for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00882             for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00883                sendCounter(i, j) = 0;
00884             }
00885          }
00886          AtomIterator  localIter;
00887          Plan* planPtr;
00888          atomStoragePtr_->begin(localIter);
00889          for ( ; localIter.notEnd(); ++localIter) {
00890             planPtr = &localIter->plan();
00891             for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00892                for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00893                   if (planPtr->ghost(i, j)) {
00894                       ++sendCounter(i, j);
00895                   }
00896                }
00897             }
00898          }
00899          for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00900             for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00901                if (sendCounter(i, j) != sendArray_(i, j).size()) {
00902                   UTIL_THROW("Incorrect sendArray size");
00903                }
00904             }
00905          }
00906       }
00907       #endif
00908       #endif
00909       #endif
00910       stamp(INIT_SEND_ARRAYS);
00911 
00912       // Cartesian directions
00913       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00914 
00915          // Transmit directions
00916          for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00917 
00918             // j = 0: Send ghosts near minimum bound to lower coordinate
00919             // j = 1: Send ghosts near maximum bound to higher coordinate
00920 
00921             // Set index for reverse direction
00922             if (j == 0) jc = 1;
00923             if (j == 1) jc = 0;
00924 
00925             bound = bound_(i, j);
00926             inner = inner_(i, j);
00927        
00928             // Shift on receiving node for periodic b.c.s
00929             shift = domainPtr_->shift(i, j);
00930 
00931             #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00932             if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
00933                bufferPtr_->clearSendBuffer();
00934                bufferPtr_->beginSendBlock(Buffer::GHOST);
00935             }
00936             #endif
00937 
00938             // Pack atoms in sendArray_(i, j)
00939             size = sendArray_(i, j).size();
00940             for (k = 0; k < size; ++k) {
00941 
00942                sendPtr = &sendArray_(i, j)[k];
00943 
00944                #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00945                if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
00946 
00947                   // If grid dimension > 1, pack atom for sending 
00948                   bufferPtr_->packGhost(*sendPtr);
00949 
00950                } else 
00951                #endif
00952                {  // if grid dimension == 1
00953 
00954                   // Make a ghost copy of local atom on this processor
00955                   atomPtr = atomStoragePtr_->newGhostPtr();
00956                   recvArray_(i, j).append(*atomPtr);
00957                   atomPtr->setId(sendPtr->id());
00958                   atomPtr->setTypeId(sendPtr->typeId());
00959                   atomPtr->plan().setFlags(sendPtr->plan().flags());
00960                   atomPtr->position() = sendPtr->position();
00961                   if (shift) {
00962                      atomPtr->position()[i] += shift * lengths[i];
00963                   }
00964                   atomStoragePtr_->addNewGhost();
00965 
00966                   #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
00967                   // Validate shifted ghost coordinate 
00968                   if (j == 0) {
00969                      assert(atomPtr->position()[i] > bound_(i, 1));
00970                   } else {
00971                      assert(atomPtr->position()[i] < bound_(i, 0));
00972                   }
00973                   #endif
00974 
00975                   // Prevent ghost copy from being re-copied within
00976                   // following loop over ghosts on same processor.
00977                   // atomPtr->plan().clearGhost(i, j);
00978  
00979                   // Add to send arrays for any remaining directions
00980                   if (i < Dimension - 1) {
00981                      for (ip = i + 1; ip < Dimension; ++ip) {
00982                         for (jp = 0; jp < 2; ++jp) {
00983                            if (atomPtr->plan().ghost(ip, jp)) {
00984                               sendArray_(ip, jp).append(*atomPtr);
00985                            }
00986                         }
00987                      }
00988                   }
00989 
00990                }
00991 
00992             }
00993             stamp(PACK_GHOSTS);
00994 
00995             #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00996             // Send and receive buffers
00997             if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
00998 
00999                bufferPtr_->endSendBlock();
01000 
01001                source = domainPtr_->sourceRank(i, j);
01002                dest   = domainPtr_->destRank(i, j);
01003                bufferPtr_->sendRecv(domainPtr_->communicator(), source, dest);
01004                stamp(SEND_RECV_GHOSTS);
01005 
01006                // Unpack ghosts and add to recvArray
01007                bufferPtr_->beginRecvBlock();
01008                while (bufferPtr_->recvSize() > 0) {
01009 
01010                   atomPtr = atomStoragePtr_->newGhostPtr();
01011                   bufferPtr_->unpackGhost(*atomPtr);
01012                   if (shift) {
01013                      atomPtr->position()[i] += shift * lengths[i];
01014                   }
01015                   recvArray_(i, j).append(*atomPtr);
01016                   atomStoragePtr_->addNewGhost();
01017 
01018                   // Prohibit sending back ghost in reverse direction
01019                   if (j == 0) {
01020                      atomPtr->plan().clearGhost(i, 1);
01021                   }
01022 
01023                   // Add to send arrays for remaining directions
01024                   if (i < Dimension - 1) {
01025                      for (ip = i + 1; ip < Dimension; ++ip) {
01026                         for (jp = 0; jp < 2; ++jp) {
01027                            if (atomPtr->plan().ghost(ip, jp)) {
01028                               sendArray_(ip, jp).append(*atomPtr);
01029                            }
01030                         }
01031                      }
01032                   }
01033 
01034                   #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
01035                   // Validate ghost coordinate on the receiving processor.
01036                   if (j == 0) {
01037                      if (atomPtr->position()[i] < bound_(i, 1)) {
01038                         std::cout << i << "  " << j 
01039                                   << "  " << atomPtr->plan()
01040                                   << "  " << atomPtr->position()[i]
01041                                   << "  " << bound_(i, 0)
01042                                   << std::endl;
01043                      }
01044                      //assert(atomPtr->position()[i] > bound_(i, 1));
01045                   } else {
01046                      if (atomPtr->position()[i] > bound_(i, 0)) {
01047                         std::cout << i << "  " << j 
01048                                   << "  " << atomPtr->plan()
01049                                   << "  " << atomPtr->position()[i]
01050                                   << "  " << bound_(i, 0)
01051                                   << std::endl;
01052                      }
01053                      //assert(atomPtr->position()[i] < bound_(i, 0));
01054                   }
01055                   #endif
01056 
01057                }
01058                stamp(UNPACK_GHOSTS);
01059 
01060             }
01061             #endif
01062 
01063          } // end for transmit direction j = 0, 1
01064 
01065       } // end for Cartesian index i
01066 
01067 
01068       // Find ghost atoms for all incomplete bonds
01069       findGroupGhosts<2>(*bondStoragePtr_);
01070       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
01071       findGroupGhosts<3>(*angleStoragePtr_);
01072       #endif
01073       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
01074       findGroupGhosts<4>(*dihedralStoragePtr_);
01075       #endif
01076 
01077       #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
01078       #ifdef EXCHANGER_DEBUG
01079       atomStoragePtr_->isValid();
01080       bondStoragePtr_->isValid(*atomStoragePtr_, 
01081                                domainPtr_->communicator(), true);
01082       #endif
01083       #endif
01084 
01085       stamp(FIND_GROUP_GHOSTS);
01086    }
01087 
01088    /*
01089    * Update ghost atom coordinates.
01090    *
01091    * Call on time steps for which no reneighboring is required. 
01092    */
01093    void Exchanger::update()
01094    {
01095       stamp(START);
01096       Vector lengths = boundaryPtr_->lengths();
01097       Atom*  atomPtr;
01098       int    i, j, k, source, dest, size, shift;
01099 
01100       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
01101          for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
01102 
01103             // Shift on receiving processor for periodic boundary conditions
01104             shift = domainPtr_->shift(i, j);
01105 
01106             if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
01107 
01108                // Pack ghost positions for sending
01109                bufferPtr_->clearSendBuffer();
01110                bufferPtr_->beginSendBlock(Buffer::UPDATE);
01111                size = sendArray_(i, j).size();
01112                for (k = 0; k < size; ++k) {
01113                   bufferPtr_->packUpdate(sendArray_(i, j)[k]);
01114                }
01115                bufferPtr_->endSendBlock();
01116                stamp(PACK_UPDATE);
01117   
01118                // Send and receive buffers
01119                source = domainPtr_->sourceRank(i, j);
01120                dest   = domainPtr_->destRank(i, j);
01121                bufferPtr_->sendRecv(domainPtr_->communicator(), source, dest);
01122                stamp(SEND_RECV_UPDATE);
01123    
01124                // Unpack ghost positions
01125                bufferPtr_->beginRecvBlock();
01126                size = recvArray_(i, j).size();
01127                for (k = 0; k < size; ++k) {
01128                   atomPtr = &recvArray_(i, j)[k];
01129                   bufferPtr_->unpackUpdate(*atomPtr);
01130                   if (shift) {
01131                      atomPtr->position()[i] += shift * lengths[i];
01132                   }
01133                }
01134                stamp(UNPACK_UPDATE);
01135 
01136             } else {
01137 
01138                // If grid().dimension(i) == 1, then copy positions of atoms
01139                // listed in sendArray to those listed in the recvArray.
01140 
01141                size = sendArray_(i, j).size();
01142                assert(size == recvArray_(i, j).size());
01143                for (k = 0; k < size; ++k) {
01144                   atomPtr = &recvArray_(i, j)[k];
01145                   atomPtr->position() = sendArray_(i, j)[k].position();
01146                   if (shift) {
01147                      atomPtr->position()[i] += shift * lengths[i];
01148                   }
01149                }
01150                stamp(LOCAL_UPDATE);
01151 
01152             }
01153 
01154          } // transmit direction j = 0, 1
01155 
01156       } // Cartesian direction i = 0, ..., Dimension - 1
01157 
01158    }
01159    #endif
01160 
01161 }
01162 #endif
Generated on Sun Jun 17 2012 08:44:48 for Simpatico by  1.7.3
